<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get Guides"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/games/{game-id}/guides"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Get all guides for a game. Successful request will return an array of [Guide Objects](/restapi/docs/schemas/guide-object).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"id","in":"query","description":"Unique id of the guide.","schema":{"type":"integer"}},{"name":"game_id","in":"query","description":"Unique id of the parent game.","schema":{"type":"integer"}},{"name":"status","in":"query","description":"Status of the guide","schema":{"title":"Guide Permission Enum","description":"Status of the guide, see [status and visibility](/restapi/docs/status-amp-visibility) for details).","type":"integer","enum":[0,1,3],"example":"1","x-enumDescriptions":{"NOT_ACCEPTED (0)":"Not accepted.","ACCEPTED (1)":"Accepted and live.","DELETED (3)":"Deleted."}}},{"name":"submitted_by","in":"query","description":"Unique id of the user who has ownership of the guide.","schema":{"type":"integer"}},{"name":"submitted_by_display_name","in":"query","description":"The display name of the user who has ownership  author.","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"visits_today","in":"query","description":"Sort results by the number of visits in the last 24hours using the [_sort query parameter](/restapi/docs/restapi-getting-started#sorting) `visits_today`. For example `_sort=-visits_today` would return the most popular guides from the last 24hours based on the number of visits.","schema":{"type":"integer"}},{"name":"visits_total","in":"query","description":"Sort results by the total number of visits using the [_sort query parameter](/restapi/docs/restapi-getting-started#sorting) `visits_total`. For example `_sort=-visits_total` would return the most popular guides based on the number of visits.","schema":{"type":"integer"}},{"name":"comments_total","in":"query","description":"Sort results by the total number of comments using the [_sort query parameter](/restapi/docs/restapi-getting-started#sorting) `comments_total`. For example `_sort=-comments_total` would return the guides with the most comments.","schema":{"type":"integer"}},{"name":"date_added","in":"query","description":"Unix timestamp of date guide was registered.","schema":{"type":"integer"}},{"name":"date_updated","in":"query","description":"Unix timestamp of date guide was updated.","schema":{"type":"integer"}},{"name":"date_live","in":"query","description":"Unix timestamp of date guide was set live.","schema":{"type":"integer"}},{"name":"name_id","in":"query","description":"Path for the guide on mod.io. For example: https://mod.io/g/gamename/r/__guide-name-id-here__","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"tags","in":"query","description":"Comma-separated values representing the tags you want to filter the results by: <br /><br /> `tags` = Return guides matching all of these tags, for instance tags=one,two,three.<br /> `tags-in` returns guides with any of the tags included in the request. For instance, tags-in=one,two,three returns all guides for the game having any of these tags<br /> `tags-not-in` If you want to ensure guides returned do not contain particular tag(s), you can use the `tags-not-in` filter","schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

Can be one of","type":"integer","enum":[0,2048],"example":"2048","x-enumDescriptions":{"DISABLED (0)":"Disabled","ALLOWS_COMMENTS (2048)":"Allows comments (default)"}},"tags":{"description":"Contains guide tag data.","type":"array","items":{"title":"Guide Tag Object","description":"Contains guide tag data.","properties":{"name":{"description":"Tag name.","type":"string","example":"Instructions"},"date_added":{"description":"Unix timestamp of date tag was applied.","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":1499841487},"count":{"description":"The amount of times this tag has been applied to guides.
